sources.title: The Last Mile
sources.description: Richard Walters (Howard Phillips) is condemned to death for a murder he claims not to have committed. He arrives on death row just before a brutal inmate leads the other convicts in a violent uprising. Walters gets caught up in the riot, while on the outside his friends are trying to find evidence of his innocence.

sources.title: The Last Mile (1932)  PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Howard Phillips, Preston Foster, George E. Stone
 Director: Samuel Bischoff

 Richard Walters is condemned to death for a murder he claims not to have committed. He arrives on death row just before a brutal inmate leads the other convicts in a violent uprising. Walters gets caught up in the riot, while on the outside his friends are trying to find evidence of his innocence.

sources.title: The Last Mile (1932) Action, Crime, Drama Pre-Code Film
sources.description:
An innocent man sentenced to death gets caught up in a prison riot.

Director: Samuel Bischoff
Writers: John Wexley, Seton I. Miller 
Stars: Howard Phillips, Preston Foster, George E. Stone
Genres: Classics, Action, Crime, Drama
